content: वाचक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [वच्-ण्वुल्] {@--1@} Speaking, declaring, explanatory. {@--2@} Expressing, signifying, denoting directly (as a word, distinguished from लाक्षणिक and व्यंजक); साक्षात्सकेतितं योर्थमभिधत्ते स वाचकः <ls>K. P. 2.</ls> {@--3@} Verbal. --कः {@--1@} A speaker. {@--2@} A reader. {@--3@} A significant word. {@--4@} A messenger.
